attributes.title: What happened to America?
attributes.review:
This place was intended to be where any person could seek refuge from tyranny, and find freedom. 
This land is meant for us all. DJT you’re doing a bad job. You are a BUSINESSMAN first and foremost that’s the lane we Americans intended for you, that is what WE HIRED YOU for.
  Get back there.
At this point If you want to win, make $15.00/hr the wage for all federal representatives period. 
These are PUBLIC SERVANT positions intended to better the everyday Americans life. 
Not only the rich and corporations. 
Cut their pay and work on the budgets otherwise, 
You’re Fired. 👈🏽

attributes.title: What The F**k!?
attributes.review: I literally only got this app a few hours ago and my phone is already glitching! I downloaded it in hopes of supporting the president in the hard time while gen Z is trying to takeover, but now I can’t even give a good review because it was so absolutely awful!!! I had to delete it because within an hour of having it, I had to restart my phone 3 times! What the f**k Trump?!

attributes.title: VERY Disappointed!!!
attributes.review: I got this app so I could look through the trump campaign but the app constantly crashes and makes my phone hot and shut off. This is the only app that does this on my phone and I don’t understand why! I deleted it and redownloaded it and it still did it! Maybe my phone just doesn’t handle racism and xenophobia and homophobia and transphobia and pedophilia and rapists and misogyny... I don’t understand! I’m SO SO SO disappointed with this app!! Please delete this app!

attributes.title: DO NOT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: My brain cells are cremated after opening this app. Never in my life have I been subjected to this kind of torture this app has put me through. It’s so disappointing and disgusting. -1000/10 wouldn’t wish it on my worst enemy
